Items.Description: A curse is making you weaker and greatly lowering your move speed and luck.
You are stunned and unable to perform actions.
You are fast asleep, unable to perform actions or evade. Taking damage will wake you but has a high chance to deal critical damage.
Encased in ice, you are unable to perform actions and vunerable to wind. Lowers DEF and increases MDEF. Breaks upon taking damage.
You are partially blinded, reducing your HIT, FLEE, and lowering the maximum range you can attack and use skills.
You are unable to speak, preventing you from performing skills or cast spells.
You are confused, making it difficult to walk in a straight line.
Poison is causing you to take damage over time. Poison can reduce your HP to 1 but it cannot deal fatal damage.
Your skin is rapidly being encased in stone, leaving you are unable to attack or use skills.
Encased in stone, you are unable to perform actions and vulnerable to fire. Lowers DEF and increases MDEF. The next hit you take will deal extra damage but end this effect.
You are enraged, making you stronger but greatly lowering your defense.
You are enraged, greatly lowering your defense.
Hallucinations are distorting your vision and making it hard to gauge how much damage you are taking.

Items.Name: Push Cart
Items.Description: Provides additional storage for items.

Items.Name: Two-Hand Quicken
Items.Description: Attack speed with two-hand weapons increased. Ends early if you unequip your two-handed weapon.

Items.Name: Blessing
Items.Description: Your STR, INT, and DEX are increased.

Items.Name: Increase Agi
Items.Description: Your move speed and AGI are increased.

Items.Name: Decrease Agility
Items.Description: Your move speed and AGI are reduced.

Items.Name: Angelus
Items.Description: Your soft DEF stat is increased. Players without Divine Protection will take reduced damage from demon and undead monsters based on the caster's skill level.

Items.Name: SignumCrusis
Items.Description: Holy light has weakened your defenses.

Items.Name: Improve Concentration
Items.Description: Your AGI and DEX are increased.

Items.Name: Endure
Items.Description: You are able to receive damage without flinching and have increased MDEF.

Items.Name: Magnum Break
Items.Description: Your strikes will deal extra fire property damage.

Items.Name: Pneuma
Items.Description: You are protected from ranged physical attacks.

Items.Name: Pneuma
Items.Description: You are protected from short ranged physical attacks.

Items.Name: Hiding
Items.Description: You are hiding beneith the ground, unable to be targeted except by demon, insect and boss monsters.

Items.Name: Crazy Uproar
Items.Description: Your STR is increased.
You are hidden from view, unable to be targeted except by demon, insect and boss monsters. Moving away from a wall will cancel the effect.
Damage taken is reduced at the cost of SP. The higher your SP pool the greater the damage reduction and SP cost.
Hidden enemies nearby will be revealed.
Hidden enemies nearby will take damage and be revealed.

Items.Name: Movement Speed UP
Items.Description: Your move speed is increased.

Items.Name: Attack Speed UP
Items.Description: Your attack speed is increased.

Items.Name: Elemental Converter (Fire)
Items.Description: Your physical attacks deal fire property damage.

Items.Name: Elemental Converter (Water)
Items.Description: Your physical attacks deal water property damage.

Items.Name: Elemental Converter (Wind)
Items.Description: Your physical attacks deal wind property damage.

Items.Name: Elemental Converter (Earth)
Items.Description: Your physical attacks deal earth property damage.

Items.Name: Dark Blessing
Items.Description: When this effect expires you will be reduced to 1 HP.

Items.Name: Power Up
Items.Description: Attack power greatly increased.

Items.Name: Speed Up
Items.Description: Move speed and evasion greatly increased.
All your attacks heal you.

Items.Name: Doom
Items.Description: You are doomed to die in the near future.

Items.Name: Stolen From
Items.Description: You've had something recently taken and cannot be stolen from again.
